properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains "adidnsdump" and FolderPath endswith "\\python.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value:
his tool enables enumeration and exporting of all DNS records in the zone for recon purposes of internal networks Python 3 and python.exe must be installed,
Usee to Query/modify DNS records for Active Directory integrated DNS via LDA
